designScenario.name: AC-DC Converter
designScenario.description: A high-reliability AC-DC power converter designed for next-generation commercial and military aircraft. The system integrates adaptive power management, fault-tolerant architecture, and advanced thermal regulation to support 24/7 operation in high-altitude environments. It ensures seamless compatibility with hybrid-electric propulsion systems and next-gen avionics while adhering to AS9100D and DO-354 standards.

details.description: Convert variable-frequency aircraft AC power (360-800Hz) to stabilized DC output with <2% voltage deviation during engine start-up transients.
Implement automatic phase synchronization for parallel operation with redundant power buses.
Achieve power density ≥1.2kW/kg with 96.5% peak efficiency at 75% load (MIL-STD-704F)
Maintain <100mVp-p output ripple under 10-100% load steps within 50μs
Implement arc fault circuit interruption (AFCI) with <5ms response time
Galvanic isolation meeting DAL-A requirements with 5kV dielectric withstand
Embedded prognostic health monitoring with MTBCF >50,000 flight hours
Conformal coating for operation in 100% relative humidity with fungus resistance (MIL-STD-810H)

systemComponents.name: Active Front-End Rectifier
systemComponents.description: Three-phase PWM rectifier with harmonic compensation (<3% THD) and unity power factor correction

subComponents.name: SiC MOSFET Bridge
subComponents.description: Silicon carbide-based switching matrix for 100kHz operation

subComponents.name: EMI Supression Filter
subComponents.description: Multi-stage filter meeting DO-160G Section 21 Category Z

systemComponents.name: Isolated DC-DC Stage
systemComponents.description: LLC resonant converter with wide-input ZVS operation (200-800VDC input range)

subComponents.name: Planar Transformer
subComponents.description: Embedded magnetics with integrated cooling channels

subComponents.name: Synchronous Rectification
subComponents.description: Adaptive dead-time control for reverse current prevention

systemComponents.name: Intelligent Thermal Manager
systemComponents.description: Predictive cooling system using fiber-optic temperature sensors and variable-speed pumps

systemComponents.name: Health Monitoring Unit
systemComponents.description: FPGA-based condition monitoring with RS-422 data bus integration

subComponents.name: Vibration Analyzer
subComponents.description: MEMS-based shock spectrum analysis for mechanical fault detection

relationships.description: DC link capacitors are shared between rectifier and DC-DC stage for energy buffering
Thermal management system requires real-time temperature data from converter's hotspot sensors
Collects switching frequency spectra for power device degradation analysis
Filter parameters dynamically adjusted based on switching node ringing characteristics

attributes.name: inputVoltageRange
attributes.description: Wide input voltage/frequency range for cross-platform aircraft compatibility

attributes.name: outputStability
attributes.description: Precision regulation for fly-by-wire systems meeting FAA AC 25.1353

attributes.name: altitudeRating
attributes.description: Pressurized operation capability for high-altitude reconnaissance aircraft

attributes.name: shockResistance
attributes.description: Crash safety rating per 14 CFR 25.561 emergency landing conditions

attributes.name: coolingCapacity
attributes.description: Two-phase liquid cooling performance at 50°C ambient

comments.body: Primary power conversion subsystem handling AC/DC and DC/DC conversion
